DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the best format for delivering a brief behavioral weight loss intervention to young adults 18-25 years of age.
DOC.brief_title: SPARK a Healthy and Fit Lifestyle
DOC.criteria: 1825 years old body mass index 2545 willing to be randomly assigned to any of the 3 arms available during the time frame of the study willing to complete assessment visits at 0, 2, 4 and 6 months Age or BMI outside of eligible range Medical condition that would interfere with weight loss or make unsupervised physical activity unsafe Pregnant or nursing within 6 months recent weight loss >10% of body weight History of eating disorder Substance abuse or dependence
